title: Wolf Outcast
description: An Enemies to Lovers Paranormal Shifter RomanceTaz is sculpted like an artwork. I want him badly.But I know that our hot, fiery relationship will bring catastrophic destruction.She’la is NOT an average eighteen year old.Powerful and unique, She’la is a rare shape shifter.She can choose to be a ravaging human OR a deadly werewolf.Her pack is on the brink of civil war,But when a rival pack enters their territory with intentions of spilling blood,Loyalties are questioned even more…Taz is a shape shifter as well and is the definition of desire.With a steamily muscular body and eyes that hypnotize lust,He wants her and She’la wants him.But there is a problem.Taz is also the leader of the deadly rival pack that has entered her pack’s territory.Will She’la resist her burning inner desire?Or will she succumb to the sensual heaven that will bring destruction to all?
author: Hailey Beckett
